name: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description:
Swarms of undead creatures and mutated terrors rule the streets,
pestilent hordes born of Umbrella's botched biowarfare research. Gather
your firepower, choose various routes and pathways, and prepare to face
the horror as you uncover the dark truth that could take Umbrella down
forever.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
